name: Topaz
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Your body shifts and reflects brilliant topazes. You gain the following benefits:
* You can't be affected by conditions. You still fall unconscious at 0 or fewer hit points.
* Allied creatures within 30 feet have a +2 bonus to saving throws.
* You can use 2 AP to cause a creature within 60 feet that you can see to radiate magical topaz-tinted light. Every creature within 30 feet that can see the target must succeed on an Intuition saving throw. On a failure, all conditions affecting the target are copied onto the creature. The duration of any copied effects is the same as the target's, except that any effects that would end before the end of your next turn are instead extended to end at the end of your next turn.

Casting another Crystal spell ends this spell immediately.
